name: reshoe
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to use nails to put new horseshoes (= curved pieces of metal) on a horse: Horses on the ranch are usually reshod every four to six weeks. Every six weeks or so, the horse needed re-shoeing so I used to ride it to the blacksmith's.
More examplesFewer examplesOutside the stable, a local blacksmith and a vet were busily reshoeing some of the horses.In the painting, blacksmiths rush to reshoe a horse for a family travelling at night.We had him reshod a week before the race, which was a mistake.The village's only claim to fame is that Oliver Cromwell once had his horse reshod here.
